title: 神父マチタンと結婚式

text_block_list.text: One day, while taking a walk in the park, I was suddenly stopped by a familiar voice.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ooooh~! Savior~! Trainer, over here~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whew, oh my. I'm glad you happened to pass by.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Actually, you see, I'd like to ask you to be the go-between for a wedding ceremony starting now.

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: Shinpu-sama, is that person the "go-between"? Then let's start, let's start!
Looking toward the voice, a boy and girl, about kindergarten age, were sitting together on a leisure sheet.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh my... Actually, I ended up being the priest and MC for these kids' pretend wedding ceremony.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But they said they won't do it without a go-between~... Haha. Um... Sorry, but could you do me one favor?
And so... For the sake of Matikanetannhauser in trouble, I decided to take on the role of go-between here, but—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: —Now then, groom-kun, bride-chan. Do you vow to love each other in sickness and in health?

text_block_list.name: Groom and Bride
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: What a good answer~. Vows, passed!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...So, what do we do after this again? Um, um—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ............ Since we're at it, I'll make a vow too.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I vow to make everyone vow everything, in sickness and in health.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And the go-between—anyway, you must vow to mediate everything. Okay?

text_block_list.name: Groom Boy
text_block_list.text: ...Um, miss. Isn't this wedding ceremony a bit too vow-heavy?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: W-w-what are you saying!? This is a proper ceremony indeed! Next is, um, um...!
The ceremony, which had been pushed through with trickery, was finally starting to fall apart—that's when it happened.

text_block_list.name: Mysterious Girl
text_block_list.text: —Hey! What are you doing getting married without permission, Ma-kun!

text_block_list.name: Groom Boy
text_block_list.text:
Huh, wait, hold on...!
This is just a game...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh? What?
What do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Mysterious Girl
text_block_list.text:
A game? Oh, I see. What a ridiculous joke.
...It must have felt good, huh?
Playing with a maiden's heart and mocking her!

...I don't really get it,
and I don't really want to,
but in short... it's a love triangle showdown!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... Fighting is no good!
As an adult, I have to stop this!
Let's go, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
--Yes! Yes! Everyone, attention!
Who do you think this person here is?!

text_block_list.name: Bride Girl
text_block_list.text: Who...? It's Nakodo-san, right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
That's right! The matchmaker who brings together
all kinds of couples in this world! Therefore,
in front of this person, no one is allowed to fight!

text_block_list.name: Mysterious Girl
text_block_list.text: What's that supposed to be!? You can't just decide that...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Fire the Matchmaker Beam!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Whoa!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
See, now everyone's getting along nicely.
Okay, from now on, let's all three play together.

Thanks to Matikanetannhauser's quick thinking (?),
the fight was settled in an instant.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Making them swear no matter the situation—
that's the way of this priest.
choice_data_list: You're like everyone's big sister, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Heh heh heh! Now then,
let's continue with the priest's great judgment.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
To avoid love triangle showdowns like this,
I, your big sister, think you all need to
learn more deeply about love.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So! This Machitan Priest Big Sister
will give you all a love lecture!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Um, okay, first point number one!
Don't say you like just anyone!
And then—

...More like common sense than love. But anyway,
Matikanetannhauser succeeded in giving the
kindergarteners her own style of moral education.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mufufu. I've always been good at dealing with little kids, you know. Like stopping fights between my brother and his friends.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Now then, let's continue the wedding... Actually, that might get complicated again, so let's play something else~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Tag? Red light, green light? Whatever we do, promise we'll all get along!
And so, the five of them played for a while... The children were able to make up completely.
